Container.Name: sqlserver2017
Container.Overview: It's MS SQL Server... on Linux... who would have thunk it?!? Uses Official images for Microsoft SQL Server based on Ubuntu @ https://hub.docker.com/_/microsoft-mssql-server/ [br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;'][/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/mnt/cache/appdata/mssql-2017[/b] This is where MS SQL Server will store it's data. For best performance, keep the files on cache drive. [b]Port 1433[/b] Default connection port [b]ACCEPT_EULA[/b] End-user License Agreement. REQUIRED TO SET, otherwise MS SQL Server will NOT START. [b]MSSQL_SA_PASSWORD[/b] Password for the sysadmin. Defaults to sqlserver if not set.
